name: Dragon Racer - Fantasy Skateboard Game
description:
Dragon Racer And Buddies! It's an all-new epic dragon race adventure! AND you can play with friends because we've introduced an epic multiplayer experience.

Capture those essential power-ups so that you can beat your friends and make sure that you cross the finish line first.

Make sure you get to meet Blaze the Dragon's friends! He's inviting you to join him and his friends on the fantasy ride of a lifetime! Join Blaze, Crokko the Crocodile, Squawka the Parrot and Timo the Turtle, download the app now!
